name: Str8 Up Aviation
about: Str8 Up Aviation, located in Fort Myers, Florida, offers professional helicopter ground and flight training. Our FAA and Transport Canada certified instructors, trained locally and internationally, specialize in R44 endorsements, instrument ratings, and advanced training. We provide certifications from sport pilot to ATP, including fixed wing to rotary wing transitions. Known for transparent, up-front pricing, we ensure no hidden costs. Our intensive daily training programs are customizable to meet your schedule, and we also offer a unique Pilot Wellness Program to address health and well-being concerns. With Florida's favorable weather, we maximize flying days, making Str8 Up Aviation an ideal choice for aspiring helicopter pilots. Call us today to start your aviation journey.
